msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch

author: brianm
msg: Use the geronimo J2EE spec jars in place of having users download the SCSL ones from Sun

author: brianm
msg: * Lots of refactoring on the dirty broker classes.
* Started adding support for explicit optimistic transactions
* Using OJB specific facades in front of the Grafolia libraries (ObjectTransaction in front of Unit)
* Starting to implement OJB specific factories for Grafolia unit

msg: updated javadoc for isInterface(), added isMappedToTable()
